introvert.value:

inviting.value: adj. 吸引人的；诱人的：attractive; tempting

involved.value: adj. 复杂的，棘手的：complicated; intricate

jeopardize.value: v. 使处于危险境地；危及；危害；损害：to expose to loss or injury; imperil

jubilant.value: adj. 欢欣鼓舞的，欣喜若狂的：exultingly joyful.

juvenile.value: adj. 少年的，青少年的：not fully grown or developed; young

adj. 尖刻的，刻薄的：affecting one as if by cutting

platitudinous.value: adj. 平凡的；陈词滥调的；陈腐的：having the characteristics of a platitude : full of platitudes

poise.value: n. 镇定；沉着；泰然自若：freedom from affectation or embarrassment; composure

polished.value:
adj. 磨光的，擦亮的：made shiny and smooth by or as if by rubbing or chemical action
adj. 完美的，精良的：having no imperfections or errors; flawless
adj. 优雅的；有教养的：refined; cultured

ponderous.value:
adj. 沉闷的，无聊的：lacking grace or fluency; labored and dull
adj. 沉重的：having great weight

porous.value: adj. 多孔的；能渗透的：something that is porous has many small holes in it, which water and air can pass through

portion.value: n. 部分：a part severed from a whole

predetermine.value:
v. 预先决定：to determine, decide, or establish in advance
【派】predetermined  adj. 预定的；预先确定的；预先决定的
【考】predetermined

preeminent.value: adj. 卓越的；杰出的；超凡的：having paramount rank, dignity, or importance : outstanding, supreme

preempt.value:
v. 抢先行动；预先制止；先发制人 ：to appropriate, seize, or take for oneself before others
【考】preempted

preference.value:
n. 喜好；偏好；偏爱：the selecting of someone or something over another or others
【注】当出现A in preference to B 的时候，考生要注意句中表达的为喜欢A而不是B；例如： She chose to learn the violin in preference to the piano. 她愿学小提琴而不学钢琴。
如果遇到的是A prefer B的时候，A偏爱B,例如：Does he prefer a particular sort of music?. 他有特别喜欢的音乐吗？
但是A prefer B1 to B2的时候，意为：比起B2，A更偏爱B1，例如：I became a teacher because I preferred books and people to politics. 我当了老师，因为我更喜欢书本和人而不是权术。
而如果遇到的是：A prefer to do something,那么意思即是：A 偏好/喜欢去做某事，此时to do something实际为一个整体，做prefer的宾语，例如：I prefer to go on self-catering holidays. 我喜欢膳食自助的度假。

prefigure.value:
v. 预示；预兆：to suggest, indicate, or represent by an antecedent form or model; presage or foreshadow
【考】prefigures

premonitory.value: adj. 预告的，前驱性的，前兆的：giving a warning that something unpleasant is going to happen; giving warning

preserve.value:
v. 保护；保存；维护：to maintain in safety from injury, peril, or harm; protect
v. 保持，维持：to keep or maintain intact
n. 保护区：an area maintained for the protection of wildlife or natural resources
【注】词根：serv  1. =serve/keep，表示"服务"； 2. 保持，保留
servile adj. 奴性的，百依百顺的 reserved adj.说话不多的
reserve n. 储备[物]，储备金；缄默observation n. 观察，观测，监视
deserve v.应受，值得 preserve v.保护，维持；保存，保藏 conserve v.保存，保藏

pressing.value:
adj. 紧迫的；紧急的；急迫的：demanding immediate attention; urgent
adj. 真切的；坚持的；急切的：very earnest or persistent; insistent

presuppose.value: v. 预先假定；以…为前提；以…为先决条件：if one thing presupposes another, the first thing cannot be true or exist unless the second thing is true or exists.

pretense.value: n. 假装；做作；矫饰：a false or studied show; an affectation

prevail.value:
v. 占上风，获胜：to be greater in strength or influence; triumph
v. 普遍：to be most common or frequent; be predominant
v. 盛行，流行：to be or continue in use or fashion : persist 
【例】an ancient tradition that still prevails古代的传统仍旧盛行
【考】prevailed

privilege.value:
n. 特权：a special advantage, immunity, permission, right, or benefit granted to or enjoyed by an individual, a class, or a caste
【考】privileged

proclaim.value:
v. 宣布；声明；公布：to announce officially and publicly; declare
v. 表明：to give outward indication of : show 
v. 赞扬；称颂：to praise or glorify openly or publicly; extol 
【派】proclamation  n. 宣布；声明；公布
【考】proclaimed

procurement.value: n. 采购，购买：procurement is the act of obtaining something such as supplies for an army or other organization

prodigious.value:
adj. 巨大的，庞大的：impressively great in size, force, or extent; enormous
adj.不可思议的；惊人的：extraordinary; marvelous

prodigy.value: n. 天才：a person with exceptional talents or powers

profound.value:
adj. 极深的：situated at, extending to, or coming from a great depth; deep
adj. 深奥的：coming as if from the depths of one's being
adj. 深远的：thoroughgoing; far-reaching
adj. 完全的：unqualified; absolute

profundity.value: n. 深奥，深度：depth of intellect, feeling, or meaning

prolong.value: v. 延长；拉长；拖长：to lengthen in duration; protract

prompt.value:
adj. 迅速的；即刻的；立即的：carried out or performed without delay
v. 促使；推动；引起 ：to move to act; spur; incite
v. 唤起；激起：to give rise to; inspire
【派】promptness  n. 敏捷；机敏；迅速
【考】prompting、promptness

propitious.value: adj. 吉祥的，有利的：presenting favorable circumstances; auspicious

zealot.value: n. 狂热者：one who is zealous, especially excessively so
